generatedPrompts.backCover: A simple and elegant back cover for a greeting card, rendered in a soft watercolor painting style. The design features a delicate, abstract watercolor wash across the top third of the card, using the same light and airy color palette from the front cover. A few subtle, artistic paint splatters drift down from the main wash, creating a sense of gentle movement. The entire image has a visible paper texture and organic paint bleeds at the edges for an authentic, hand-painted feel. The background is a clean, light color. IMPORTANT: The bottom-right corner, approximately 1 inch square, is left completely blank and undecorated for QR code placement.
generatedPrompts.frontCover:
A funny and heartwarming birthday card front cover, in a flat 2D watercolor painting style. Two stylized cartoon characters, based on the reference photo of Lao Lao and Jordan, are the central focus. Jordan is playfully trying to lift Lao Lao up in a piggyback ride but is comically struggling, with bent knees and a strained, laughing expression. Lao Lao is on his back, laughing joyfully with her arms thrown wide in celebration. The scene is filled with soft, flowing watercolor colors, artistic brush strokes, visible paper texture, and organic paint bleeds at the edges for an authentic hand-painted feel. In the center of the image, written in a beautiful, readable, handwritten cursive script, is the text "Happy Birthday". The background is simple and light, keeping the focus on the funny, loving interaction between the two characters.

CRITICAL CHARACTER REFERENCE INSTRUCTIONS: I have provided a reference photo as input image. You MUST create cartoon/illustrated characters that accurately represent ONLY the people who are actually visible in this reference photo with high fidelity to their appearance.

MANDATORY CHARACTER MATCHING REQUIREMENTS - ONLY INCLUDE WHAT IS ACTUALLY VISIBLE:
- REPRESENT ONLY PEOPLE ACTUALLY IN THE PHOTOS: Create cartoon versions of ONLY the people who are actually shown in the reference photos. Do NOT add, create, or imagine any additional people not present in the reference images.
- EXACT hair color, hair style, and hair length from each reference photo - only what is actually visible
- PRECISE facial features for each person: eye color, eye shape, nose shape, face structure, skin tone - exactly as shown in the reference
- ACCURATE clothing: replicate ONLY the EXACT clothing items, colors, patterns, and styles actually worn by each person in their reference photo - do not add or change any clothing items
- ACCESSORIES ONLY IF VISIBLE: Include accessories (glasses, jewelry, hats, watches, bags, etc.) ONLY if they are actually visible on each person in the reference photo. DO NOT add glasses if they are not wearing glasses in the photo. DO NOT add jewelry if they are not wearing jewelry in the photo. DO NOT add any accessories that are not clearly visible in the reference image.
- CORRECT body proportions and posture as shown for each person in their reference
- FAITHFUL age representation and gender presentation for each individual - exactly as they appear
- AUTHENTIC facial expressions and poses from the reference images, lean towards making the people look happier unless the user specifically asks for a different expression
- GROUP COMPOSITION: If multiple people are actually shown in the photos, arrange them naturally together in a pleasing composition that fits the card's theme

CRITICAL RESTRICTION: Do not add, remove, or modify any visual elements beyond what is actually visible in the reference photos. Only include people, clothing, and accessories that are clearly shown in the reference images.

Study every detail of the people actually in the reference image and recreate them as stylized cartoon characters while maintaining 100% accuracy to their distinctive visual features. The characters must be immediately recognizable as the same people from the reference photo. Pay special attention to clothing details and accessories that are actually visible, and unique personal style elements that make each person distinctive. Do not add or imagine any elements not present in the reference.

The cartoon style should be charming and artistic while preserving complete visual accuracy to the reference photo. Only represent people, clothing, and accessories that are actually visible in the reference images.
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: A beautiful and artistic left interior for a greeting card. The design features an abstract pattern of overlapping watercolor shapes and delicate brush strokes, creating a full-bleed background. The color palette is harmonious and consistent with the front cover, filled with soft, flowing colors. The overall effect is gentle, decorative, and visually pleasing, with a visible paper texture and organic paint bleeds to maintain the hand-painted watercolor style. The artwork is purely decorative and contains no people or text.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior: The right interior of a greeting card featuring a beautiful watercolor design. The background is a soft, light-colored wash with visible paper texture, consistent with the front cover's style. Delicate, abstract watercolor elements and soft paint splatters elegantly frame the corners of the card. Centered on the page, the following message is written in a beautiful, readable, handwritten cursive script: "Happy Birthday to my wonderful girlfriend, Lao Lao! I was going to get you a ridiculously expensive gift, but then I remembered my presence is priceless. You're welcome! I love you more than anything. Love, Jordan". The text is the main focus, seamlessly integrated with the gentle, artistic watercolor decorations. The design contains no people or characters.
